author: timesunion.com
title: Summaries
text:
Photo: Eric Jenks Image 1 of / 1 1 Albany's Queone Sylvester breaks out onto the brand new field at Albany High School at the start of the game against CBA Saturday, October 17th, 2015. Photo by Eric Jenks, for the Times Union. Albany's Queone Sylvester breaks out onto the brand new field at Albany High School at the start of the game against CBA Saturday, October 17th, 2015.
